name: Python Cloud Debugger v3.1
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: save data in /snapshot instead of /snapshots. by @mctavish in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-debug-python/pull/56
* chore: release version 3.1 by @mctavish in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-debug-python/pull/57


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-debug-python/compare/v3.0...v3.1

name: Python Cloud Debugger v3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* feat: add Firebase RTDB backend by @mctavish in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-debug-python/pull/48
* feat: improve firebase error handling by @mctavish in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-debug-python/pull/53
* chore: release 3.0 by @mctavish in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-debug-python/pull/54
* build: bump to manylinux2014 by @mctavish in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-debug-python/pull/55


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-debug-python/compare/v2.19...v3.0

name: Python Cloud Debugger v2.19
body:
* Drop Python 2.7 support
* Migrate build & release system
* Update glog and gflags versions
* Bug fixes

name: Python Cloud Debugger v2.18
body:
- Support Google Cloud Functions platform and region detection.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

name: Python Cloud Debugger v2.17
body: Bug fixes and improvements

name: Python Cloud Debugger v2.16
body:
* Add support for Python 3.9
* Use environment markers in setup.py
* Bug fixes and improvements

name: Python Cloud Debugger v2.15
body:
* Support GCP [breakpoint canary feature](https://cloud.google.com/debugger/docs/using/snapshots#with_canarying).
* General improvements and bug fixes.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.14
body: Provides experimental support for Python 3.8.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.13
body:
This release
* Log version number
* Fix bugs and improve things

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.12
body: Bug fixes and improvements.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.11
body: This version adds support for GCP Cloud Run environment. Please refer to product documentation for more information on this.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.10
body: This release contains several bug fixes and performance improvements.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.9
body:
This release adds:
Better pretty printing of protorpc.messages.Enum and certain exceptions
Built the agent according to manylinux requirements
An experimental version of the agent for Python 3.7

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.8
body:
This release:
Removed the static linking of libstdc++ which could cause conflicts with a different version installed on the system.
Removed support for authenticating via P12 files.
Added support for application default credentials, and removed the need to pass the --enable_service_account_auth, --project_id, and --project_number flags for authentication.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.7
body: This release adds minor bugfixes for the Python 3 agent, mainly relating to setting breakpoints on lazily imported modules.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.6
body:
This release:
Fixes the segfault when the Python 3 agent exits.
Removes the warning messages logged for https://github.com/google/google-api-python-client/issues/345

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.5
body: Adds experimental support for Python 3.6.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.4
body: A new module search algorithm was added.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.3
body:
Fixes the following bugs identified in v2.2:
  * Fixed module search algorithm to better handle multiple matching modules (e.g., main.py).
  * Address situations where an imported module for a deferred breakpoint was missed.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.2
body:
Fixes the following bugs identified in v2.1:
  * Fixed module search algorithm to better handle symbolic links.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.1
body:
Fixes the following bugs identified in v2.0:
1. Fixes "Multiple source files match" error when the same source file is reachable via multiple entries in sys.path.
2. Fixes "No line N in file foo.py" error seen by deferred breakpoints when the corresponding foo.py module gets activated.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 2.0
body:
This release contains the following major changes:
1. Improved algorithm for identifying loaded and not-yet-loaded Python modules.
2. Better error messages when the file path provided by the user is not found or is not unique.
3. A new import hook mechanism.
4. Bug fixes to address breakpoint and debuggee id flakiness.
5. New agent version format string.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 1.18
body:
This release adds:
Using '$$' to escape the '$' character in a logpoint message
Excluding lambas and generators from possible locations to set a snapshot or logpoint, they will always be set on the outer function where they are defined
More informative error message for 'python module not found' and 'no code found at line'
Keys in dictionaries are now captured with repr instead of str

name: Python Cloud Debugger 1.17
body: This release makes line number reporting for the top frame more accurate by using the original definition instead of the line number table which could be inaccurate.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 1.16
body:
This release:

Adds rate limiting for logpoints, for both total messages logged and total bytes logged.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 1.15
body:
This release:

1. Supports new environment variables set by GAE Flex.
2. Prints class names when using logpoints.
3. Displays class names in stack trace when using breakpoints. 
4. Supports capturing byte arrays.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 1.14
body:
This release:
- Improves location reporting for logpoints
- Works around the race condition in http://bugs.python.org/issue7980 to avoid failures when setting breakpoints.
- Modifies the stack capture code to retrieve data in user-specified expressions before the rest of the local variables.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 1.13
body:
This release:
- Fixes a performance issue related to setting a breakpoint in a module that is not yet loaded.
- Enhances reporting capabilities for expired breakpoints.
- Adds a timeout to enable the debugger to recover from failed calls to the hub service.
- Relaxes the limit on list data capture for explicitly-requested expressions.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 1.12
body:
This version:

Changes enable_service_account_auth to use json auth files. The previous support for p12 files has been dropped from oauth2client, so we are moving to the recommended style of auth.

Fixes an issue where breakpoints could cause Python applications to crash if GC occurred while enumerating the members of an object.

FIxes parsing of timestamp text to handle the case where OnePlatform infrastructure strips a redundant ".000".

name: Python Cloud Debugger 1.11
body: This version supports oauth2client v3.0.0.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 1.10
body: Added a consistent prefix to logpoints. Fixed documentation bug. Changed debugger entrypoint to "enable".

name: Python Cloud Debugger 1.8
body: This release adds support for the LOG breakpoint action, and suppresses some overly-verbose logging in discovery.py.

name: Fix startup sequence issues
body: This version contains fixes for some issues relating to the load order for system modules in some environments.

name: Python Cloud Debugger 1.6
body: Version 1.6 adds logpoint support and miscellaneous fixes.
